verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יוּשַׁ֥ר <S%H7891><s%> be sung הַשִּׁיר־ <S%H7892><s%> shall this song הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city עָז־ <S%H5794><s%> fierce לָ֔נוּ יְשׁוּעָ֥ה <S%H3444><s%> salvation יָשִׁ֖ית <S%H7896><s%> will [God] appoint חוֹמ֥וֹת <S%H2346><s%> [for] walls וָחֵֽל׃ <S%H2426><s%> and bulwarks

פִּתְח֖וּ <S%H6605><s%> Open שְׁעָרִ֑ים <S%H8179><s%> ye the gates וְיָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> may enter in גוֹי־ <S%H1471><s%> nation צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> that the righteous שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> which keepeth אֱמֻנִֽים׃ <S%H529><s%> the truth

יֵ֣צֶר <S%H3336><s%> [whose] mind סָמ֔וּךְ <S%H5564><s%> [is] stayed תִּצֹּ֖ר <S%H5341><s%> Thou wilt keep שָׁל֣וֹם ׀ <S%H7965><s%> [him] in perfect שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because בְךָ֖ בָּטֽוּחַ׃ <S%H982><s%> [on thee] because he trusteth

בִּטְח֥וּ <S%H982><s%> Trust בַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> ye in the LORD עֲדֵי־ <S%H5704><s%> against עַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> in בְּיָ֣הּ <S%H3050><s%> for in the LORD יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> JEHOVAH צ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> strength עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <S%H5769><s%> [is] everlasting

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הֵשַׁח֙ <S%H7817><s%> For he bringeth down יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> them that dwell מָר֔וֹם <S%H4791><s%> on high קִרְיָ֖ה <S%H7151><s%> city נִשְׂגָּבָ֑ה <S%H7682><s%> the lofty יַשְׁפִּילֶ֤נָּה <S%H8213><s%> he layeth it low יַשְׁפִּילָהּ֙ <S%H8213><s%> he layeth it low עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [even] to the ground יַגִּיעֶ֖נָּה <S%H5060><s%> he bringeth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> it [even] to the dust

תִּרְמְסֶ֖נָּה <S%H7429><s%> shall tread it down רָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> The foot רַגְלֵ֥י <S%H7272><s%> [even] the feet עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> of the poor פַּעֲמֵ֥י <S%H6471><s%> [and] the steps דַלִּֽים׃ <S%H1800><s%> of the needy

אֹ֥רַח <S%H734><s%> The way לַצַּדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> of the just מֵֽישָׁרִ֑ים <S%H4339><s%> [is] uprightness יָשָׁ֕ר <S%H3477><s%> thou most upright מַעְגַּ֥ל <S%H4570><s%> the path צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> of the just תְּפַלֵּֽס׃ <S%H6424><s%> dost weigh

אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> Indeed אֹ֧רַח <S%H734><s%> Yea in the way מִשְׁפָּטֶ֛יךָ <S%H4941><s%> of thy judgments יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD קִוִּינ֑וּךָ <S%H6960><s%> have we waited לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> [is] to thy name וּֽלְזִכְרְךָ֖ <S%H2143><s%> and to the remembrance תַּאֲוַת־ <S%H8378><s%> for thee the desire נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> of [our] soul

נַפְשִׁ֤י <S%H5315><s%> With my soul אִוִּיתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H183><s%> have I desired בַּלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> thee in the night אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Indeed רוּחִ֥י <S%H7307><s%> yea with my spirit בְקִרְבִּ֖י <S%H7130><s%> within אֲשַֽׁחֲרֶ֑ךָּ <S%H7836><s%> me will I seek thee early כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> for כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> your מִשְׁפָּטֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H4941><s%> for when thy judgments לָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [are] in the earth צֶ֥דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness לָמְד֖וּ <S%H3925><s%> will learn יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants תֵבֵֽל׃ <S%H8398><s%> of the world

יֻחַ֤ן <S%H2603><s%> Let favour be shewed רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> to the wicked בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> [yet] will he not לָמַ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> learn צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land נְכֹח֖וֹת <S%H5229><s%> of uprightness יְעַוֵּ֑ל <S%H5765><s%> will he deal unjustly וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> and will not יִרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> behold גֵּא֥וּת <S%H1348><s%> the majesty יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God ס

יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD רָ֥מָה <S%H7311><s%> is lifted up יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> [when] thy hand בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> not יֶחֱזָי֑וּן <S%H2372><s%> they will not see יֶחֱז֤וּ <S%H2372><s%> [but] they shall see וְיֵבֹ֙שׁוּ֙ <S%H954><s%> and be ashamed קִנְאַת־ <S%H7068><s%> for [their] envy עָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> at the people אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Indeed אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> yea the fire צָרֶ֥יךָ <S%H6862><s%> of thine enemies תֹאכְלֵֽם׃ <S%H398><s%> shall devour ס

יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD תִּשְׁפֹּ֥ת <S%H8239><s%> thou wilt ordain שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace לָ֑נוּ כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Since גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> have also כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֖ינוּ <S%H4639><s%> all our works פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <S%H6466><s%> for us for thou also hast wrought לָּֽנוּ׃

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God בְּעָל֥וּנוּ <S%H1166><s%> thee have had dominion אֲדֹנִ֖ים <S%H113><s%> [other] lords זֽוּלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H2108><s%> beside לְבַד־ <S%H905><s%> alone בְּךָ֖ נַזְכִּ֥יר <S%H2142><s%> over us [but] by thee only will we make mention שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> of thy name

מֵתִים֙ <S%H4191><s%> [They are] dead בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> will not יִחְי֔וּ <S%H2421><s%> they shall not live רְפָאִ֖ים <S%H7496><s%> [they are] deceased בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> will not יָקֻ֑מוּ <S%H6965><s%> they shall not rise לָכֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore פָּקַ֙דְתָּ֙ <S%H6485><s%> therefore hast thou visited וַתַּשְׁמִידֵ֔ם <S%H8045><s%> and destroyed וַתְּאַבֵּ֥ד <S%H6><s%> to perish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֵ֖כֶר <S%H2143><s%> them and made all their memory לָֽמוֹ׃

יָסַ֤פְתָּ <S%H3254><s%> Thou hast increased לַגּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> the nation יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD יָסַ֥פְתָּ <S%H3254><s%> thou hast increased לַגּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> the nation נִכְבָּ֑דְתָּ <S%H3513><s%> thou art glorified רִחַ֖קְתָּ <S%H7368><s%> thou hadst removed [it] far כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קַצְוֵי־ <S%H7099><s%> [unto] all the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD בַּצַּ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> in trouble פְּקָד֑וּךָ <S%H6485><s%> have they visited צָק֣וּן <S%H6694><s%> thee they poured out לַ֔חַשׁ <S%H3908><s%> a prayer מוּסָרְךָ֖ <S%H4148><s%> [when] thy chastening לָֽמוֹ׃

כְּמ֤וֹ <S%H3644><s%> Like הָרָה֙ <S%H2030><s%> as a woman with child תַּקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> [that] draweth near לָלֶ֔דֶת <S%H3205><s%> the time of her delivery תָּחִ֥יל <S%H2342><s%> is in pain תִּזְעַ֖ק <S%H2199><s%> [and] crieth out בַּחֲבָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H2256><s%> in her pangs כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus הָיִ֥ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> thy מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> so have we been in thy sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD

הָרִ֣ינוּ <S%H2030><s%> conceive חַ֔לְנוּ <S%H2342><s%> we have been in pain כְּמ֖וֹ <S%H3644><s%> we have as it were יָלַ֣דְנוּ <S%H3205><s%> brought forth ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind יְשׁוּעֹת֙ <S%H3444><s%> any deliverance בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> neither נַ֣עֲשֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> we have not wrought אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth וּבַֽל־ <S%H1077><s%> Nor יִפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> fallen יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> have the inhabitants תֵבֵֽל׃ <S%H8398><s%> of the world

יִֽחְי֣וּ <S%H2421><s%> [men] shall live מֵתֶ֔יךָ <S%H4191><s%> Thy dead נְבֵלָתִ֖י <S%H5038><s%> [together with] my dead body יְקוּמ֑וּן <S%H6965><s%> shall they arise הָקִ֨יצוּ <S%H6974><s%> Awake וְרַנְּנ֜וּ <S%H7442><s%> and sing שֹׁכְנֵ֣י <S%H7931><s%> ye that dwell עָפָ֗ר <S%H6083><s%> in dust כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For טַ֤ל <S%H2919><s%> for thy dew אוֹרֹת֙ <S%H219><s%> of herbs טַלֶּ֔ךָ <S%H2919><s%> [is as] the dew וָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth רְפָאִ֥ים <S%H7496><s%> the dead תַּפִּֽיל׃ <S%H5307><s%> shall cast out ס

לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Come עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> my people בֹּ֣א <S%H935><s%> enter בַחֲדָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H2315><s%> thou into thy chambers וּֽסְגֹ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> and shut [דְּלָתֶיךָ כ] (דְּלָתְךָ֖ <S%H1817><s%> door ק) בַּעֲדֶ֑ךָ <S%H1157><s%> behind חֲבִ֥י <S%H2247><s%> about thee hide כִמְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> thyself as it were for a little רֶ֖גַע <S%H7281><s%> moment עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until [יַעֲבֹור כ] (יַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> runs זָֽעַם׃ <S%H5674><s%> be overpast ק)

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> For behold the LORD יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> cometh out מִמְּקוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H4725><s%> of his place לִפְקֹ֛ד <S%H6485><s%> to punish עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity יֹֽשֵׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְגִלְּתָ֤ה <S%H1540><s%> also shall disclose הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמֶ֔יהָ <S%H1818><s%> her blood וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and will no תְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> and shall no more cover ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הֲרוּגֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H2026><s%> her slain ס
